data.expected_result: It should be in client language
data.short_description: Push notifications are system language based rather than client language (Discord)
data.steps_to_repro: - Change your system language to Swedish, Dutch or something - Set your client language (Discord) to English - Trigger a push notification (Friend request received, accepted, DM call missed, incoming DM call, someone joining a group DM/server notification, etc.) - Observe the language of the push notification
